post.text: Debate is over but the fight isn't. The FINAL FEC deadline for the entire campaign is minutes away at 11:59p! Donate now to make this a RECORD NIGHT. Contribute $10 >> DonaldJTrump.com/Debate

comment.author: Connor
comment.text: Hillary talking out the side of her mouth about babies shooting guns but she will abort you 2days before your born without a blink of her eye!

replies.author: Emily
replies.text: Thank you Connor for making that connection, too. How stupid is that!!!
